instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 Won't boot OSX
threads.message:
I have a 820-00165 here that seems to work fine in EFI however will freeze while loading the OS. This happens when booting from the SSD or from USB, replacing the SSD made no difference and the RAM has been tested with memtest and passed fine. I initially thought this might be a firmware issue so I flashed the bios with e clean ME bios image but the problem still exists

Any ideas?

threads.title: 820-00165 Won't boot OSX
threads.message:
Did you clean ME yourself?
What BIOS file used?

threads.title: 820-00165 Won't boot OSX
threads.message: No  I didn't, I have to be honest I can't remember where I actually got the image

threads.title: 820-00165 Won't boot OSX
threads.message:
Cleaned the ME of the original bios, macbook boots fine now, I'll clean the ME's of bios's manually form now on rather than blindly trusting ones posted online
Thanks

threads.title: 820-00165 Won't boot OSX
threads.message:
You've learned the lesson now.
This will help you on the future ;).
